a sound made when someone is thinking about something or needs more time to decide what to say

GOVERNMENT abbreviation for Her (or His) Majesty's: belonging to or being a part of the government of the UK: HM Inspector of Taxes HM Treasury is planning a substantial tax increase on tobacco. See also
HMG
HMRC
